tagline: Everything you need to launch your first SaaS
description: A complete tech stack for solo developers building their first product. From code to deployment to analytics, this stack has you covered without overwhelming complexity.
Modern tools for developers building AI features into their products. Includes APIs, vector databases, deployment platforms, and monitoring—everything to ship AI products fast.

tagline: Ship a profitable SaaS for under $100/month
description: Proven stack used by successful indie hackers. Keep costs low while you validate your idea and grow to your first customers. Scale-friendly but optimized for the bootstrapped journey.

tagline: Create, edit, and distribute content like a pro
description: Everything a developer-turned-creator needs. Build your personal brand, share your journey, and grow your audience while building in public.

tagline: Validate your idea without writing code
description: Perfect for non-technical founders or developers who want to test ideas fast. Build, launch, and validate in days instead of months.
Build modern full-stack apps with the latest tech. Next.js for frontend, Supabase for backend, Vercel for hosting. Type-safe, fast, and scalable from day one.
Run your apps at the edge with Cloudflare Workers, Hono for APIs, and D1 for database. Lightning-fast performance worldwide with minimal infrastructure management.

tagline: Ship iOS and Android from one codebase
description: Build beautiful native mobile apps with React Native and Expo. Add subscriptions with RevenueCat, analytics with PostHog, and push notifications with OneSignal.

tagline: Own your data, control your costs
description: Complete self-hosted stack for privacy-conscious teams. Host everything yourself with Coolify, Plausible for analytics, n8n for automation, and PostgreSQL for data.
Everything you need to launch and monetize your indie project. Includes payment processing, email marketing, analytics, and customer support—all with generous free tiers.
Supercharge your development workflow with Cursor for AI coding, Warp for terminal, Raycast for productivity, and modern testing tools. Built for speed.
Create real-time collaborative apps with PartyKit for sync, Liveblocks for presence, and Next.js for the frontend. Perfect for collaborative tools and multiplayer features.
Create developer-focused products with FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Stripe for billing, Mintlify for docs, and Vercel for deployment. Everything to build API businesses.
Build a thriving newsletter business with Beehiiv for publishing, ConvertKit for automation, Canva for graphics, and Plausible for analytics. Monetization built-in.
Streamline your design-to-code workflow with Figma for design, v0.dev for AI component generation, shadcn/ui for components, and Vercel for deployment.
Comprehensive analytics setup with Tinybird for real-time data, Metabase for dashboards, Segment for event tracking, and PostHog for product analytics.
Complete e-commerce stack with Stripe for payments, Resend for transactional emails, Uploadthing for product images, and Vercel for hosting. Start selling fast.
Modern DevOps toolkit with GitHub Actions for CI/CD, Better Stack for monitoring, Doppler for secrets, and Railway for deployment. Sleep better at night.

tagline: Build admin panels in hours, not weeks
description: Rapidly build internal tools with Retool for UIs, Supabase for database, Trigger.dev for background jobs, and Auth0 for authentication. Empower your team.
Complete AI chatbot stack with OpenAI for LLMs, Pinecone for vector search, LangChain for orchestration, Vercel AI SDK for streaming, and Supabase for data.
Build blazing-fast content sites with Astro for the framework, Sanity for CMS, Cloudflare for CDN, and Plausible for analytics. Optimized for SEO and performance.
Everything to ship fast: Next.js frontend, Supabase backend, Clerk for auth, Stripe for payments, and PostHog for analytics. Battle-tested by thousands of startups.
Scale your codebase with Turborepo for builds, pnpm for packages, Vercel for deployment, and Changesets for versioning. Perfect for teams managing multiple apps.

tagline: Keep users engaged and coming back
description: Boost retention with Intercom for support, Novu for notifications, Canny for feedback, and Mixpanel for behavioral analytics. Build products users love.
Respect user privacy while getting insights with Plausible for web analytics, PostHog for product analytics, and Umami as backup. GDPR-compliant by default.
